jp.go.aist.six.vuln.repository.scap.cve

Interface CveRepository

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CveRepositoryImpl, HttpCveRepositoryClient

    public interface CveRepository
    The prescription of the NVD repository interface. This repository provides the NVD/CVE vulnerability entries and the CVE dictionary items.
    Version:
    $Id: CveRepository.java 606 2013-06-13 06:10:20Z nakamura5akihito@gmail.com $
    Author:
    Akihito Nakamura, AIST
    See Also:
    National Vulnerability Database (NVD)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long countCveItem()
      Returns the number of CVE items in the database.
      long countCveItem(jp.go.aist.six.util.repository.QueryParams params)
      Returns the number of CVE items that match the specified query parameters.
      jp.go.aist.six.util.repository.QueryResults<ItemType> findCveItem()
      Returns all the CVE items in the database.
      jp.go.aist.six.util.repository.QueryResults<ItemType> findCveItem(jp.go.aist.six.util.repository.QueryParams params)
      Searches for the CVE items that match the specified query parameters.
      ItemType findCveItemByName(String name)
      Returns the CVE item of the specified name.
      jp.go.aist.six.util.repository.QueryResults<String> findCveName()
      Returns all the CVE names.
      jp.go.aist.six.util.repository.QueryResults<String> findCveName(jp.go.aist.six.util.repository.QueryParams params)
      Searches for the CVE names that match the specified query parameters.
      String saveCveItem(ItemType item)
      Saves the CVE item, either inserting or updating the existing one.
